channel.title: Connected From Error
channel.description:
My server won't write the connectedfrom file for anything. This is the error that I keep getting when somebody signs on:
[code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfromHoly One.txt (The system cannot fin d the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.appendConnected(client.java:8141) at client.run(client.java:8360)[/code]
Please help.
~Sparky_gp

item.title: Connected From Error
item.dc:creator: @Sparky_gp Sparky_gp
item.description:
@Sparky_gp wrote:

I fixed it. My Connectedfrom file had 3 n’s. LOL.

~Sparky_gp

Read full topic
